DescriptionData.Title: Pride Socks - Mens Prismatic Rainbow Striped Business Socks
DescriptionData.Description:
Add a bit of fun to your business outfit. These black business socks have rainbow stripes of red, orange, yellow, green, blue and purple at the top of each sock and the text "PRIDESOCKS" printed in white on the toes of each sock. No one will know They are made of Spun Cotton for extra softness.
Style One is mid calf.
82% Ring Spun Cotton, 10% Polyester, 4% Acrylic, 2% Spandex, 2% Nylon and made in the USA.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Black Rainbow Striped Men's Business Socks
Great for adding a splash of color to any business outfit
The socks have rainbow stripes of red, orange, yellow, green, blue and purple at the top of each socks and the text "PRIDESOCKS" printed in white on the toes of each sock
Sized for men, will fit men's shoe size 6-13 and will be 1/2 to 3/4 to knee high for most
82% Ring Spun Cotton, 10% Polyester, 4% Acrylic, 2% Spandex, 2% Nylon and made in the USA
